skills: Account reconciliations, Results-oriented, Financial reporting, Critical thinking, Accounting operations professional, Analysis of financial systems, ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software, Excellent facilitator
summary: Financial Accountant specializing in financial planning, reporting and analysis within the Department of Defense.
work_experience: Served as an Accountant from July 2011 to November 2012, where they were responsible for identifying and resolving issues affecting the DEAMS General Ledger, worked with Procure to Pay, Orders to Cash, and Budget to Report areas, and supported the deployment of DEAMS. They led a tiger team that identified and resolved General Ledger postings and managed $360B in accounting adjustments for fiscal year-end close in 2012, and developed a tool that deobligated over $5M in duplicate obligations. From April 2010 to June 2011, as a Resource Advisor, they provided financial advice and decision support for 1ACOS, coordinated a $4.6M budget, managed project timelines, discussed budget outcomes, monitored the Defense Travel System (DTS) and General Accounting and Finance System, and managed Government Purchase Card (GPC) processes, including identifying training requirements and developing guidance.
